metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6173 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: NSD before 4.1.11 allows remote DNS master servers to cause a denial of service (/tmp disk consumption and slave server crash) via a zone transfer with unlimited data.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Not considered a security issue due to trust relationship, see #830806

criterions.comment: nsd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
